appDescription: Fulfill your religious obligations in the digital era for the ASEAN community

whatIsZakat.title: What is Crypto Zakat?
whatIsZakat.content: Crypto zakat is a religious obligation to give a portion of your crypto assets to eligible recipients. Like gold and silver zakat, crypto assets are subject to zakat if certain conditions are met.
points: JAKIM fatwa states crypto assets are zakat liable
Zakat rate is 2.5% of net asset value
Nisab based on 85 grams of gold
Haul period is 354 days (1 Hijri year)

howToCalculate.title: How to Calculate Crypto Zakat
steps: Sum all your crypto assets in local currency on calculation date.
Deduct any debts related to crypto investments.
If net value exceeds nisab, zakat is obligatory.
